title: How to Install an ARIES 4" Round Big Steps on Ram 1500 Quad Cab
description: See exactly what you need for installation of 4" Round Big Steps (part #AL235017), then watch as the process is explained step-by-step.
tags: Aries, Side Bar, Big Step, Nerf Bars, Running Boards, Dodge Ram 1500

asset.title: ARIES Side Bar Install: 4" Big Step AL235017 on Ram 1500 Quad Cab
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES AL235017 4" Big Step Sidebars.  These side bars are made out of lightweight aluminum, making it 40% lighter than carbon steel, and will never rust or corrode.  These side bars are available in a textured black powder coat finish.  

Features Include:
No Drill Application
Durable Light Weight Aluminum Alloy
4" OD Heavy Wall Tubes
Custom Raised Step Pads

Vehicle Coverage:
2009-2015 Ram 1500 Quad Cab

Part #
AL231007 (Textured Black Powder Coat Finish)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
